attributes.action: Call for another general election for the British citizens to have the right
attributes.additional_details: We deserve to have another general election we cant wait 4 years on a government who dont have the British people first
attributes.background: We have the right by human rights law to have another general election enough is enough

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
